352320.name: Cakewalk Expansion Pack - Bass
352320.description:
You must own the STEAM version of Music Creator or SONAR to use this DLC

This is a great collection of basses ready to take care of the low end. Electric and synthesizer basses include realistic fingered, jazz, & slap along with a palate of synth basses. Combine them and the possibilities are bottomless! Programs allow for control of filter, EQ, and effects settings. (52 Programs)
